name.jp: ワールドフリフマント(メキシコ)

description.en: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.ar: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.br: Esta capa tem uma representação de corpo inteiro da bandeira do México.
description.cns: 这件披风上有墨西哥国旗的图案。
description.de: Ein Umhang mit der Flagge von Mexiko
description.fi: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.fil: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.fr: Cette cape est décorée sur sa longueur du drapeau du Mexique.
description.id: Cloak ini memiliki penggambaran penuh bendera Meksiko di atasnya.
description.it: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.jp: このマントにはメキシコの国旗が描かれています。
description.kr: 이 망토에는 멕시코의 국기가 전면적으로 묘사되어 있다.
description.nl: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.pl: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.ru: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.sp: Esta Capa tiene una representación de cuerpo entero de la bandera de México.
description.sw: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Mexico on it.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมนี้มีภาพธงชาติเม็กซิโกเต็มผืนอยู่ด้วย
description.vi: Chiếc áo choàng này có độ dài đầy đủ mô tả lá cờ của Mexico trên đó.
